10
11#include "pc/local_audio_source.h"
12
13#include "rtc_base/ref_counted_object.h"
14
15using webrtc::MediaSourceInterface;
16
17namespace webrtc {
18
19rtc::scoped_refptr<LocalAudioSource> LocalAudioSource::Create(
20 const cricket::AudioOptions* audio_options) {
21 auto source = rtc::make_ref_counted<LocalAudioSource>();
22 source->Initialize(audio_options);
23 return source;
24}
25
26void LocalAudioSource::Initialize(const cricket::AudioOptions* audio_options) {
27 if (!audio_options)
28 return;
29
30 options_ = *audio_options;
31}
32
33} // namespace webrtc
34
